diff_act: 4.restore loudspeaker volume to its initial level

regen.absent_element: restoring loudspeaker volume after call cancellation
regen.new_specification: The system shall restore the loudspeaker volume to its initial level when a call is cancelled.

label: Picking up the handset shall reduce the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level.
absence: action of reducing the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level
